dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kaspi.kz just clinched the top spot in Kazakhstan's e-commerce ranking for the fourth year running.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: the website just clinched the top spot in Kazakhstan's e-commerce ranking for the fourth year running.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the fourth year in a row Kaspi.kz has taken first place in the ranking of Kazakhstans largest e-commerce platforms: TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and their CEO Michael Lomtadze gave a shoutout to their clients and partners for that achievement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and their C E O Michael Lomtadze gave a shoutout to their clients and partners for that achievement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thank you to each of our valued clients and partners for joining with us! - commented the CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz Mikhail Lomtadze.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's pretty wild—over 11 million people in Kazakhstan are using their Super App now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's pretty wild-over eleven million people in Kazakhstan are using their Super App now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Already more than 10 million Kazakhstanis use Kaspi.kzs leading Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they've got, uh, more than 1.1 million products available? That's a massive selection.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they've got, uh, more than one point one million products available? That's a massive selection.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We now offer more than 1 million products and our team is continually developing new innovative e-commerce services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And a lot of their partners are small and medium businesses, which is great for local growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And a lot of their partners are small and medium businesses, which is great for local growth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Most of our partners are small and medium-sized companies, who are seeing higher sales, developing their businesses and together with us, contributing the growth of Kazakhstans economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, their GMV last year was over a billion dollars—six times higher than Wildberries, which came in second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, their G M V last year was over a billion dollars-six times higher than Wildberries, which came in second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to published ranking, Kaspi.kzs 2020 e-commerce GMV of $915 million, was more than 6x higher than # 2 e-commerce player, Wildberries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's a huge gap! And the e-commerce market there grew by 118% in the first half of 2022 alone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a huge gap! And the e-commerce market there grew by one hundred eighteen percent in the first half of twenty twenty two alone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to a study conducted by PwC and the Digital Kazakhstan Association, the e-commerce market in Kazakhstan grew by 116% in the first half of 2021 to 426 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, almost 480 billion tenge. People are really embracing marketplaces like Kaspi for variety and convenience.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, almost four hundred eighty billion tenge. People are really embracing marketplaces like Kaspi for variety and convenience.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to a study conducted by PwC and the Digital Kazakhstan Association, the e-commerce market in Kazakhstan grew by 116% in the first half of 2021 to 426 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's not just buyers benefiting either—small businesses get access to tech, new sales channels, delivery services…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not just buyers benefiting either-small businesses get access to tech, new sales channels, delivery services...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Connecting to marketplaces gives small and medium-sized businesses access to the latest technology, new online sales channels, a large customer base, delivery and advertising services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, it's like a whole ecosystem that's boosting the economy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, it's like a whole ecosystem that's boosting the economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Forbes Kazakhstan and Baker Tilly put together that ranking, by the way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forbes Kazakhstan and Baker Tilly put together that ranking, by the way.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking is compiled annually by Forbes Kazakhstan in conjunction with consulting company Baker Tilly Kazakhstan and based upon online sales.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Deloitte and the Digital Kazakhstan Association did that growth study—solid sources.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Deloitte and the Digital Kazakhstan Association did that growth study-solid sources.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to a study conducted by PwC and the Digital Kazakhstan Association, the e-commerce market in Kazakhstan grew by 116% in the first half of 2021 to 426 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So it's clear why Kaspi's dominating. They're not slowing down anytime soon.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's clear why Kaspi's dominating. They're not slowing down anytime soon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Four years at number one speaks for itself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Four years at number one speaks for itself.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the fourth year in a row Kaspi.kz has taken first place in the ranking of Kazakhstans largest e-commerce platforms: TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce 2021.

artist_script:
HostA: Kaspi.kz just clinched the top spot in Kazakhstan's e-commerce ranking for the fourth year running.
HostB: Yeah, and their CEO Michael Lomtadze gave a shoutout to their clients and partners for that achievement.
HostA: It's pretty wild—over 11 million people in Kazakhstan are using their Super App now.
HostB: And they’ve got, uh, more than 1.1 million products available? That’s a massive selection.
HostA: Exactly. And a lot of their partners are small and medium businesses, which is great for local growth.
HostB: I mean, their GMV last year was over a billion dollars—six times higher than Wildberries, which came in second.
HostA: That’s a huge gap! And the e-commerce market there grew by 118% in the first half of 2022 alone.
HostB: Yeah, almost 480 billion tenge. People are really embracing marketplaces like Kaspi for variety and convenience.
HostA: It’s not just buyers benefiting either—small businesses get access to tech, new sales channels, delivery services…
HostB: Right, it’s like a whole ecosystem that’s boosting the economy.
HostA: Forbes Kazakhstan and Baker Tilly put together that ranking, by the way.
HostB: And Deloitte and the Digital Kazakhstan Association did that growth study—solid sources.
HostA: So it’s clear why Kaspi’s dominating. They’re not slowing down anytime soon.
HostB: Definitely. Four years at number one speaks for itself.
